titles.title: Restoring Our Commitment to Renewable Fuels Act of 2018

To provide for reallocation of the renewable fuel obligation of exempted small refineries under section 211(o) of the Clean Air Act (42 U.S.C. 7545(o)) to other refineries, blenders, distributors, and importers, and for other purposes.
Restoring Our Commitment to Renewable Fuels Act of 2018

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.

bill.summary:
Restoring Our Commitment to Renewable Fuels Act of 2018
This bill revises the Renewable Fuel Program. If the Environmental Protection Agency (EPA) gives exemptions to small refineries from their renewable fuel obligations during a year, then the EPA must reallocate each gallon of renewable fuel covered by such exemptions to refineries, blenders, distributors, and importers subject to a renewable fuel obligations for that year.
